basics.name: Nick Allison
basics.label: Electrical Engineering & Computer Science Student
basics.summary: Self-driven, passionate electrical engineer and computer science student. I am always looking for challenging problems.

work.name: Qualcomm
work.summary: Worked for the display team on the Snapdragon X Elite series & beyond. I was responsible for working on power optimization on the hardware, I also worked test runtime optimizations and compile time optimizations.
highlights: Led the transition to using CMake as the build system
167% improvement in total compilation time (67 Minutes to 25 Minutes)
Presented this transition live to the team of 70 engineers

work.name: Maparobo
work.summary: Worked for a company developing a landscaping robot. I was responsible for developing the software for the robot, and also needed to troubleshoot the electronics and mechanical components.
highlights: Fixed locational accuracy issue by creating a custom Kalman filter for the IMU.
Designed a custom Convolutional Neural Network. Lowered false positive rate by 90%.

work.name: University of Calgary - Peer Assisted Study Sessions
work.summary: Mentored and tutored first-year engineering students.
highlights: Improved grades of regular attendees by an average of at least 1 letter grade.
